about_the_game:
A modern, indie, interpretation on the well established genre of city builders; meet Uber Urban. With genre-defining mechanics as well as more innovative strategy elements, Uber Urban enables players to build the city of their dreams like never before.

Enjoy building your city with a large, ever expanding catalogue of buildings; manage your finances through taxation and demand and build a truly thriving metropolis with hundreds of thousands of inhabitants. Be careful though, as your management and construction decisions will affect the growth and success of your city.

Every action you make, no matter how big or small, will impact your approval rating. Sign or revoke policies, by-laws, and subsidies, just as a real mayor world. Find the fine line between profits and happiness, but remember to have a majority approval rating when election time comes.

Get to know the people of your city on a more personal level, and learn what they want from you. Be sure to fulfil promises on time in order to get a reward and stay in good standing with your community.

Experience many more gameplay features like loans, budgeting, nature, mixed use buildings, achievements, city stats, services, demand and more!
